<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.validateEmailAddress</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>On demand Script include to validate email address syntax using regular expressions.</description><name>validateEmailAddress</name><script><![CDATA[function validateEmailAddress(emailStr){
	// Use javaScript coercion to guarantee emailStr is a string
	emailStr = emailStr + '';
	// Compare emailStr against the allowed syntax as specified in the regular expression
	// If emailStr has allowed syntax, return true, else return false
	if(emailStr.match(/^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/)){
		return true;
	}
	else {
		return false;
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-03 21:36:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>8325dbc41b540110ca412f08b04bcb72</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>validateEmailAddress</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8325dbc41b540110ca412f08b04bcb72</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-03 21:36:40</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
